title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: The History Boys
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Timothy Noah discuss The History Boys, a film version of the play by Alan Bennett. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
